gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Trail Blazers 122, Grizzlies 92
gameRecap.excerpt: The Trail Blazers defeated the Grizzlies, 122-92. Dalano Banton (19 points, seven rebounds) and Jabari Walker (19 points, 10 rebounds, two steals) combined for 38 points for the Trail Blazers in the victory, while Jake LaRavia tallied a game-high 21 points for the Grizzlies in the losing effort. The Trail Blazers snap a nine-game losing streak as they improve to 16-42 on the season, while the Grizzlies fall to 20-40.
